name: VERIF_STATUS_HX
description: The VERIF_STATUS_HX table contains the history of your verification records. These records include verification information for patients, guarantors, coverages, coverage members, hospital accounts, and encounters.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the verification record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VERIF_STATUS_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: The history of the verification status for this record.

columns.name: VERIF_DATE_HX_DTTM
columns.description: The history of the date on which the record was verified.

columns.name: VERIF_USER_HX_ID
columns.description: The history of the user who last verified the record.

columns.name: VERIF_USER_HX_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: NEXT_REV_DATE_HX_DT
columns.description: The history of the next review date for this record.

columns.name: STAT_CHNG_HX_DTTM
columns.description: The history of the status change date for this record.
